title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 387.3 - Indemnification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 387.3 - Indemnification

State Regulations

Except for loss resulting from honoring counterfeit
coupons, the local department shall be responsible to the department either
directly or through its agent, to the same extent the department is responsible
to FNS for loss or shortage of coupons. Any payment to the department under
this section shall not be reimbursable as an expenditure for the purpose of
certifying eligibility, nor for distribution of or redemption of such stamps or
coupons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
387.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
